doc.field: Group photo of Ottoman soldiers in military uniforms holding gloves and swords. Addressing Sehzade Nurettin Efendi (1901-1944, son of Abdulhamit II) with the signature of Mulazim-i sani (second lieutenant) Nureddin (Nureddin Ibrahim Konyar, 1873 - 1932)." 27.8 x 38 cm
